promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi young epic eagle psychic-type pokemon wearing a purple cosmic crown. It can be found in crypt-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, psychic or eagle. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Cryptalon, a a chibi young epic eagle psychic-type pokemon. It can be found in crypt-like environments It has the following abilities: Golurk Hammer, Wise Guidance. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "eagle", "psychic" or "Cryptalon". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of psychic-type pokemon, eagle-like, epic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, galaxy background
generatedDescription: Residing in ancient crypts, the youthful Cryptalon channels mystic power gracefully. With its Golurk Hammer, it escorts lost souls peacefully.
